import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.scss"; import logo from "./images/logo_pineapple.png"; import pineapple from "./images/pineapple.png"; import arrow from "./images/ic_arrow.png"; import fb from "./images/Facebook.svg"; function App() { const [validationMessage, setValidationMessage] = useState(""); const emailValidation = () => { let value = document.forms["subscription"]["email"].value; console.log(value); if (!value) { console.log("Please provide a valid e-mail address"); return false; } }; // Invalid email is added - “Please provide a valid e-mail address” // - The checkbox is not marked - “You must accept the terms and conditions” // - No email address is provided - “Email address is required” // - Provided email is ending with .co - “We are not accepting subscriptions from Colombia // emails” return (
